<h3 id="X12701">X(12701)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd JOHNSON-YFF TO 3rd EXTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4+(b+c)*a^3-4*b*c*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(12701) = 2*X(1210)-3*X(11238) = 3*X(5603)-X(6934) = 3*X(5886)-2*X(6924)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(12701) lies on these lines: {1,30}, {3,11376}, {4,1000}, {5,5119}, {7,5558}, {8,3967}, {10,4679}, {11,40}, {12,1697}, {20,1319}, {21,5832}, {35,5886}, {36,11373}, {46,496}, {55,946}, {56,516}, {57,9589}, {63,3813}, {65,497}, {72,4863}, {78,528}, {145,5057}, {149,3869}, {165,5433}, {210,5082}, {226,3303}, {354,1058}, {355,3583}, {381,10039}, {388,5919}, {390,3485}, {498,9955}, {499,3579}, {515,2098}, {517,1479}, {518,1898}, {546,10827}, {550,1387}, {908,3913}, {944,5048}, {950,2099}, {960,3434}, {999,1770}, {1012,10966}, {1038,12652}, {1125,5217}, {1155,3086}, {1191,3914}, {1210,11238}, {1317,6259}, {1385,4302}, {1388,4297}, {1478,9957}, {1482,9668}, {1512,10893}, {1519,11500}, {1537,6261}, {1698,7173}, {1709,10949}, {1737,9669}, {1788,5183}, {1839,2256}, {1864,5758}, {1902,11393}, {2475,3890}, {2478,5836}, {2646,4294}, {2802,12764}, {2886,5250}, {3146,3476}, {3295,12047}, {3296,5551}, {3304,4292}, {3305,9710}, {3333,11246}, {3416,3702}, {3419,3878}, {3421,3893}, {3436,3880}, {3486,11011}, {3487,3748}, {3586,5812}, {3601,5805}, {3612,5901}, {3616,5880}, {3673,5195}, {3698,5084}, {3746,11374}, {3772,3915}, {3868,5180}, {3876,7673}, {3877,5794}, {3885,5080}, {3895,12607}, {3911,5493}, {4305,10595}, {4342,10106}, {4388,4673}, {4640,10527}, {4857,5722}, {4861,11114}, {4870,5703}, {5087,5552}, {5123,5187}, {5221,11019}, {5432,8227}, {5533,12515}, {5657,10591}, {5690,10826}, {5691,7962}, {5727,11531}, {5840,12740}, {6001,12116}, {6734,11235}, {6949,7704}, {6985,11508}, {7288,9778}, {7580,11510}, {7686,10531}, {7741,11010}, {7991,9581}, {8715,11813}, {8727,10957}, {9578,9819}, {9671,11362}, {9779,10588}, {9911,10832}, {10065,12261}, {10087,12611}, {10306,11502}, {10366,10373}, {10698,12743}, {10738,12758}, {10798,12197}, {10806,12675}, {10874,12497}, {10925,12697}, {10926,12698}, {10947,12672}, {10958,12703}, {10959,12704}, {10965,12608}, {11871,12458}, {11872,12459}, {12666,12688}</p>
<p>
X(12701) = midpoint of X(962) and X(6836)<br>
X(12701) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (40,6922), (46,496), (56,12053), (1837,1479), (3149,946)<br>
X(12701) = X(40)-of-2nd-Johnson-Yff-triangle<br>
X(12701) = inner-Johnson-to-ABC similarity image of X(40)<br>
X(12701) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,1836,10404), (1,9579,5434), (1,9580,6284), (1,12699,1836), (4,3057,5252), (40,9614,11), (55,946,11375), (226,12575,3303), (388,9785,5919), (497,962,65), (946,10624,55), (950,4301,2099), (1058,4295,354), (1482,9668,10572), (1697,1699,12), (2099,9670,950), (3086,6361,1155), (3579,7743,499), (3583,5697,355), (9785,9812,388)<br>
</p>
